name: A Bit Nerd's New Card Game (Mac)
name_original: A Bit Nerd's New Card Game (Mac)
description:
A Bit Nerd's New Card game is a deck-building dueling game. You are a wizard battling another powerful wizard in a library. You must search the Library to find powerful spells to defeat your opponent.

Play against your friends online!

Create new cards with Card Maker!
